message.body: Whoa! Did you take a picture?
No. but she has soooo many things in common with you!
An artist from rural PA, tattooed and pierced, interested in gaming and hip cartoons...and wants to learn tattooing. Weird, huh?
That's bizarre! Are you going to teach her?

I tried sending a pic, but it wouldn't go thru.
I doubt it. We'll see.
Haven't gotten any pics from you. (taps foot) any tattoos?
No, work has been crazy. Hopefully things will settle down soon and I can start scheduling some B&Gs.
I work at a casino down here now as a banker. Good pay, good hours, tattoo friendly. My unemployment was almost done so I had to take something.
